text:
Illinois voters can participate in the open primary on March 19. All U.S. House districts are holding elections in 2024. Incumbent Mike Bost and Darren Bailey are in the race to become the Republican candidate in Illinois' 12th Congressional District. Voters will also select their presidential preference. Ryan Binkley, Chris Christie, Ron DeSantis, Nikki Haley and Donald Trump are on the GOP ballot. Joe Biden, Frank J. Lozada, Dean Phillips, and Marianne Williamson are on the Democratic ballot.

Results updated every 2 minutes or less (some races may update less frequently).
title: Illinois primary election results
